Exaggerate: The claim of a Dalit farmer being burnt alive in Amethi is an exaggeration as the video actually shows a different incident where a married couple set themselves on fire.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a video shared on Twitter without any additional evidence or verification.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is from Amethi, Uttar Pradesh, without providing any concrete evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The video actually shows a different incident where a married couple set themselves on fire due to harassment by a local muscleman, which is an alternative explanation to the claim made.
